Posts.Content: PSA testing should start at age 50 and when a doubling is noted, psa should be tested every three months. Within one year of being monitored my prostate was removed.I know that this does not help at this point and i feel bad for you and your husband .Ido hope that some one else will read this post and learn. Today much can be done to save a life with prostate cancer please tell me you are not seeing an old family doctor?.

Posts.Title: 5 weeks post prostatectomy psa

Posts.Content: Don,t worry it will all turn outlet us know how it,s going when you can. Ask for a morphine drip I asked and the doc gave to me he was surprised on how little i used but when sleep in a weird place is necessary it will do the trick.
Posts.Signature: Age 55 PSA 11/08-3 12/09-3.5 7/10-4.75 8/1-4.6 Gleason score 6 lt lobe 2 of 5 C rt lobe 4 of 5 C tc2
Posts.Title: Da Vinci robotic prostatectomy recovery--the first weeks after surgery--advice wanted

Posts.Content: I went back to work two weeks after I work out side and do physical work of sorts . Heavy lifting a squirt of pee the only problem start doing your kegel exercises now. JMO.
